Name: project_status_active_only
Description: Only consider projects with active status

Name: budget_cannot_exceed_limit
Description: Project budget must not exceed the approved cap

Name: minimum_team_size
Description: Teams must meet a minimum effective team size

Name: maximum_daily_scrum_duration
Description: Daily Scrum duration should not exceed target

Name: po_availability_required
Description: Product Owner availability required during sprint

Name: limit_wip_on_board
Description: Cap number of cards on the Scrum board

Name: feature_effort_cap
Description: Do not pull features above an effort threshold

Name: sprint_backlog_effort_cap
Description: Total sprint backlog effort must stay within capacity

Name: min_sprint_review_attendees
Description: Sprint Review must have a minimum number of attendees

Name: min_velocity_floor
Description: Maintain a minimum team velocity across sprints

Name: blocker_status_cannot_be_open_in_done
Description: No open blockers allowed on done tasks
